zh.title: 六国峰会在法国朗布依埃举行
土耳其共和国塞浦路斯北部成立
巴解组织宣布接受联合国242号决议
苏联礼炮七号空间站坠毁
中国成功发射东方红三号卫星
越南股市胡志明指数正式启动
卡西尼-惠更斯号探测器抵达土星轨道
佳士得拍卖行售出达芬奇《救世主》

en.title: Bangladesh coup: Khondaker Mostaq Ahmad becomes president.
Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus declared independence.
PLO recognized Israel's right to exist.
Space Shuttle Atlantis (STS-38) launched on a classified military mission.
Final report on the collapse of Barings Bank released.
The Concorde made its final commercial flight.
Sale of Leonardo da Vinci's Salvator Mundi for $450.3 million.
Australia defeated India to win the Cricket World Cup.
